attributes.action: ensure that Kate and Gerry McCann are treated in a fair and just manner by the Portuguese authorities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We firmly believe that Kate and Gerry McCann are in no way involved in the disappearance of their daughter, Madeleine, and as British citizens are entitled to all the protection and support that the British Government can provide to help them clear their names and focus the police investigation back onto finding Madeleine.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
